name: drnkwati/repack-translation
description: Standalone Illuminate Translation Version 5.6 For PHP 5.3. Namespace (Illuminate\Translation) has been maintained for maximum compatibility with other illuminate packages.

suggest.Illuminate/Support: You must install Illuminate\Support >=4.1. We avoid requiring in composer.json to provide developer flexibility.
suggest.drnkwati/repack: You may install drnkwati\repack as alternative to Illuminate\Support.
